## Cloud IDE Link


::: rstudio-cloud
The RStudio Cloud workspace containing the application exercises is [here](https://rstudio.cloud).
If you haven't already registered for RStudio Cloud and joined the workspace, please do so now.
Be sure to register through the link we sent to you via e-mail since we purchased an RStudio Cloud premium version for this course.
:::

Note: if you want to exchange the title "RStudio Cloud:", e.g., to "Google Colab",
change the tag `.rstudio-cloud:before` in the file `css/custom-environments.css`.
